N_FSM_Transition_NoLog_t Struct Reference

Detailed Description

Defines one transition in a finite state machine

Definition at line 90 of file N_Fsm.h.

Field Documentation

N_FSM_Event_t N_FSM_Transition_NoLog_t::event

The event that triggers the transition, or the state in the transistion table in case the first bit is set.

Definition at line 95 of file N_Fsm.h.

N_FSM_Condition_t N_FSM_Transition_NoLog_t::ConditionalFunction

N_FSM_NONE/N_FSM_ELSE (for no condition) or a condition that tells whether to make the transition.

Definition at line 99 of file N_Fsm.h.

N_FSM_Action_t N_FSM_Transition_NoLog_t::ActionFunction

Action, if not N_FSM_NONE, to perform when the transition occurs.

Definition at line 102 of file N_Fsm.h.

N_FSM_State_t N_FSM_Transition_NoLog_t::nextState

This is the state to which the transition occurs, or N_FSM_SAME_STATE.

Definition at line 105 of file N_Fsm.h.
